description.raw:
Resubmission of pull request #189 and pull request #195.

The matching push is on line 226.

Fixing this exposed a bunch of uses of deprecated `sdf::Vector3`, `sdf::Quaternion`, and `sdf::Pose` variables, so I had to fix those warnings as well. The side-by-side diff viewer is recommended.

Also, I was observing [build failures with gcc](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/SDFormat/job/sdformat-any-devel-utopic-amd64/52/) that I fixed by changing the location of the `#pragma` statements (0f36c8e). It worked either way on clang. I wonder if it's a gcc bug.

title.raw: Fix pragma from pull request #173 (push should actually be pop)

The matching push is on line 226.

Fixing this exposed a bunch of uses of deprecated sdf::Vector3, sdf::Quaternion, and sdf::Pose variables, so I had to fix those warnings as well. The side-by-side diff viewer is recommended.
